name: d3-marching-squares
description: Tools for drawing your raster files with JavaScript

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3marchingsquares -o build/d3-marching-squares.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-marching-squares.js -c -m -o build/d3-marching-squares.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-marching-squares.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-marching-squares.js build/d3-marching-squares.min.js
